com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class LoyaltyManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.LoyaltyManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoyaltyManagerService

    public class LoyaltyManagerService
extends Object
implements ILoyaltyManagerService
    The Class LoyaltyManagerService. This class contains the method implementation to support loyalty management operations.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
